fullText: The new musical 'Allegiance,' which opened on Sunday at the Longacre Theater, tackles the shameful chapter in American history when Japanese-Americans were forced into internment camps during World War II. But for all its good intentions and sterling pedigree, this show feels more dutiful than passionate.
